statements: SELECT * FROM ProductInformation;
SELECT product_id, color FROM ProductInformation;
SELECT material, measurement FROM ProductInformation WHERE color = 'Red';
SELECT * FROM ProductInformation WHERE measurement > 10;
SELECT color, measurement, material FROM ProductInformation ORDER BY measurement DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductInformation WHERE material = 'Cotton';
SELECT product_id, color FROM ProductInformation WHERE measurement > 10 ORDER BY color DESC;
SELECT material, measurement FROM ProductInformation WHERE color = 'Blue' AND measurement < 5 ORDER BY material ASC;
SELECT product_id, measurement FROM ProductInformation WHERE color LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductInformation WHERE color = 'Red' OR material = 'Polyester' ORDER BY measurement DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM materials;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_measurement = '10x10';
SELECT product_name, product_color FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, material_name FROM products JOIN materials ON products.product_material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM materials WHERE material_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, product_measurement, material_name FROM products JOIN materials ON products.product_material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_measurement > '10' AND product_color = 'Red';
SELECT product_name, product_measurement, material_name FROM products JOIN materials ON products.product_material_id = materials.material_id ORDER BY product_measurement DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name FROM materials WHERE material_id = 1
SELECT material_name, material_id FROM materials ORDER BY material_id DESC
SELECT color_name FROM colors WHERE color_id = 2
SELECT * FROM measurements ORDER BY measurement_name
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM measurements ORDER BY measurement_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, color_name FROM materials JOIN colors ON materials.material_id = colors.color_id;
SELECT material_name, measurement_name FROM materials LEFT JOIN measurements ON materials.material_id = measurements.measurement_id;
SELECT material_name FROM materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%wood%';
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, color_name, hex_code FROM products JOIN colors ON products.color_id = colors.color_id;
SELECT product_name, material_name, quantity FROM products JOIN materials ON products.material_id = materials.material_id JOIN measurements ON products.measurement_id = measurements.measurement_id;
SELECT product_id, material_name, color_name FROM products JOIN materials ON products.material_id = materials.material_id JOIN colors ON products.color_id = colors.color_id ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY price DESC, material_name ASC;

SELECT product_name, material_name, measurement_name FROM products INNER JOIN materials ON products.material_id = materials.material_id INNER JOIN measurements ON products.measurement_id = measurements.measurement_id;
SELECT color_name, hex_code, COUNT(*) as total_products FROM colors LEFT JOIN products ON colors.color_id = products.color_id GROUP BY color_name, hex_code;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products INNER JOIN measurements ON products.measurement_id = measurements.measurement_id WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT AVG(price) as avg_price, MIN(price) as min_price, MAX(price) as max_price FROM materials;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name FROM materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN product_inventory ON products.product_id = product_inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM colors ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT measurement_type FROM measurements WHERE measurement_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM materials

SELECT product_name, material_name, measurement_type FROM products JOIN materials ON products.material_id = materials.material_id JOIN measurements ON products.measurement_id = measurements.measurement_id
SELECT color_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products JOIN colors ON products.color_id = colors.color_id GROUP BY color_name
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN product_inventory ON products.product_id = product_inventory.product_id WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC

SELECT product_name, material_name, measurement_type, color_name, quantity FROM products JOIN materials ON products.material_id = materials.material_id JOIN measurements ON products.measurement_id = measurements.measurement_id JOIN colors ON products.color_id = colors.color_id JOIN product_inventory ON products.product_id = product_inventory.product_id
